一つの夢 叶うまで負けない 行くよ\r\n: I'll keep going until my one dream comes true, here I go
いいかい？もっともっと！\r\n: Raring to go? More and more!
三分鼎足？油断無し！\r\n: Stand together with three? Don't ignore me!
もぎ取って笑ってやる！\r\n: Laugh at me, I'll break off!
全力を出して走る 倒れるまでは\r\n: Run with every ounce of strength until you collapse
ゼッタイに負けない くよくよ後ろ向いてる\r\n: I will not lose, looking back makes me mope
そんな時間はない 今(RIGHT NOW!)\r\n: I have no time for that right now (RIGHT NOW!)
キモチバラバラ思いがぶつかって\r\n: I'm feeling disparate with conflicting thoughts
上手くいかなくて困っちゃう(はぁ～)\r\n: I'm having trouble getting this right (hah~)
さあ 夢掴む準備はいいね？(1,2！)\r\n: Come, are you ready to seize your dream? (1,2!)
一つの夢を叶えたい思いは\r\n: The desire to make my one dream come true is certain
たとえ苦しくて諦めそうでも\r\n: Even if I'm about to give up because of hardships
負けられない相手がいるの 今\r\n: There's someone I can't lose to, now
私らしい姿を目指したあの頃から\r\n: Since those days when I tried to be a person of my own
変わらない夢を掴み取るの！\r\n: I'll hold onto that same dream!
(叶えられる)\r\nきっと誰にも負けないわ\r\n: The desire to make my one dream come true is certain
